name: Ancient Astronauts
description: Ancient Astronauts is a third-person action-adventure game that blends ancient egypt theme with ufology. Inspired by the bestselling book: “Chariot of the Gods?” by author Erich Von Däniken. The game shows the quest for identity of the protagonist Enuk, where everything and everyone is different from him. The rise of a cruel dynasty to bring its gods to earth at all costs in search of technology and knowledge.
